title: find_neighbors
description:
Compute a neighborhood graph of observations [McInnes18].

The neighbor search efficiency of this heavily relies on UMAP [McInnes18], which also provides a method for estimating connectivities of data points - the connectivity of the manifold (method=='umap'). If method=='gauss', connectivities are computed according to [Coifman05], in the adaption of [Haghverdi16].

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

modality.description: Which modality from the input MuData file to process.

obsm_input.description: Which .obsm slot to use as a starting PCA embedding.

output.description: Output h5mu file containing the found neighbors.

uns_output.description: Mandatory .uns slot to store various neighbor output objects.

obsp_distances.description: In which .obsp slot to store the distance matrix between the resulting neighbors.

obsp_connectivities.description: In which .obsp slot to store the connectivities matrix between the resulting neighbors.

metric.description: The distance metric to be used in the generation of the nearest neighborhood network.

num_neighbors.description: The size of local neighborhood (in terms of number of neighboring data points) used for manifold approximation

output_compression.description:
Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects.
By default no compression is applied.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
